dict.acceptation: 政府；政体；治理的形式；管辖，治理；

sent.orig: From 1993, President Clinton and Vice President Gore of the U.S. A brought forward the E-Government.
sent.trans: 自从1993年美国前总统克林顿和副总统戈尔在其任期内首倡电子政务(E-Government)，电子政务便在全世界范围内开展起来。

sent.orig: Concepts of e-Business, e-Marketing, e-Government, e-Management, e-Home, e-Library, e-learning, etc. are becoming popular through the world.
sent.trans: e-Business、e-Marketing、e-Government、e-Management、e-Home、e-Library、e-Learn-ing等概念正在全世界范围内迅速流行。

sent.orig: The Micro-government:A Responsible Government with Authority──Analysis on Bentham's Government Theory.
sent.trans: 小政府是有权威的责任政府——边沁功利主义政府思想分析。

sent.orig: Agencies is composed of three parts: Central Government, Provincial Government and Municipal Government.
sent.trans: 包括“中央政府”、“省级政府”、“市级政府”三个板块。

sent.orig: We may thank into consideration accepting government-to-government or non-government loan, if condition permit.
sent.trans: 只要条件允许，我们可以接受政府间或非政府间贷款。
